00037 #ifndef EGS_GTRANSFORMED_
00038 #define EGS_GTRANSFORMED_
00039

00041 #include "egs_transformations.h"

00045     #ifdef BUILD_GTRANSFORMED_DLL

00101 class EGS_GTRANSFORMED_EXPORT EGS_TransformedGeometry :
00102     public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00103 
00104 protected:
00105 
00106     EGS_BaseGeometry    *g;   
00107     EGS_AffineTransform T;    
00108     string              type; 
00109 
00110 public:
00111 
00115     EGS_TransformedGeometry(EGS_BaseGeometry *G, const EGS_AffineTransform &t,
00116                             const string &Name = "") : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), g(G), T(t) {
00117         type = g->getType();
00118         type += "T";
00119         nreg = g->regions();
00120         is_convex = g->isConvex();
00121         has_rho_scaling = g->hasRhoScaling();
00122     };
00123 
00124     ~EGS_TransformedGeometry() {
00125         if (!g->deref()) {
00126             delete g;
00127         }
00128     };
00129 
00130     void setTransformation(const EGS_AffineTransform &t) {
00131         T = t;
00132     };
00133 
00134     int computeIntersections(int ireg, int n, const EGS_Vector &x,
00135                              const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_GeometryIntersections *isections) {
00136         EGS_Vector xt(x), ut(u);
00137         T.inverseTransform(xt);
00138         T.rotateInverse(ut);
00139         return g->computeIntersections(ireg,n,xt,ut,isections);
00140         //return g->computeIntersections(ireg,n,x*T,u*T.getRotation(),isections);
00141     };
00142     bool isRealRegion(int ireg) const {
00143         return g->isRealRegion(ireg);
00144     };
00145     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00146         EGS_Vector xt(x);
00147         T.inverseTransform(xt);
00148         return g->isInside(xt);
00149         //return g->isInside(x*T);
00150     };
00151     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00152         EGS_Vector xt(x);
00153         T.inverseTransform(xt);
00154         return g->isWhere(xt);
00155         //return g->isWhere(x*T);
00156     };
00157     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00158         return isWhere(x);
00159     };
00160 
00161     int medium(int ireg) const {
00162         return g->medium(ireg);
00163     };
00164 
00165     EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00166                               const EGS_Vector &u) {
00167         return ireg >= 0 ? g->howfarToOutside(ireg,x*T,u*T.getRotation()) : 0;
00168     };
00169     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00170                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed=0, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00171         EGS_Vector xt(x), ut(u);
00172         T.inverseTransform(xt);
00173         T.rotateInverse(ut);
00174         int inew = g->howfar(ireg,xt,ut,t,newmed,normal);
00175         //int inew = g->howfar(ireg,x*T,u*T.getRotation(),t,newmed,normal);
00176         if (inew != ireg && normal) {
00177             *normal = T.getRotation()*(*normal);
00178         }
00179         return inew;
00180     };
00181 
00182     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00183         EGS_Vector xt(x);
00184         T.inverseTransform(xt);
00185         return g->hownear(ireg,xt);
00186         //return g->hownear(ireg,x*T);
00187     };
00188 
00189     int getMaxStep() const {
00190         return g->getMaxStep();
00191     };
00192 
00193     // Not sure about the following.
00194     // If I leave the implementation that way, all transformed copies of a
00195     // geometry share the same boolean properties. But that may not be
00196     // what the user wants. So, I should implement both options:
00197     // all copies share the same properties and the user has the options
00198     // to define separate properties for each copy.
00199     bool hasBooleanProperty(int ireg, EGS_BPType prop) const {
00200         return g->hasBooleanProperty(ireg,prop);
00201     };
00202     void setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType prop) {
00203         g->setBooleanProperty(prop);
00204     };
00205     void addBooleanProperty(int bit) {
00206         g->addBooleanProperty(bit);
00207     };
00208     void setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType prop, int start, int end, int step=1) {
00209         g->setBooleanProperty(prop,start,end,step);
00210     };
00211     void addBooleanProperty(int bit, int start, int end, int step=1) {
00212         g->addBooleanProperty(bit,start,end,step);
00213     };
00214 
00215     const string &getType() const {
00216         return type;
00217     };
00218 
00219     EGS_Float getRelativeRho(int ireg) const {
00220         return g->getRelativeRho(ireg);
00221     }
00222     void setRelativeRho(int start, int end, EGS_Float rho);
00223 
00224     void setRelativeRho(EGS_Input *);
00225 
00226     virtual void getLabelRegions(const string &str, vector<int> &regs);
00227 
00228 protected:
00229 
00236     void setMedia(EGS_Input *inp,int,const int *);
00237 
00238 };
00239 
00240 #endif
